description:
Clair is Hachimaki`s exgirlfriend. She was born in the (fictional) South American country of El Tanika. She`s a child of immigrants and couldn`t read until she was eight. She works in the Control Section as the supervisor of the debris Section. She has lived in space for three years.
She was given the nickname Swan by Gigalt because swans look all elegant and graceful as they glide along the water, but under the water their legs are paddling away like crazy. Clair pushes herself too hard.
name: Clair Rondo
